column7: Lecture courses in topics of current interest; specific subject matter will be announced in the Class Schedule. 2 to 4 graduate hours. No professional credit. May be repeated, if topics vary, in the same semester to a maximum of 12 hours and in separate semesters to a maximum of 16 hours. Prerequisite: Will be determined for each section offered and will be indicated in the Class Schedule.
